body:
I'm not sure if the below is related to the photon-ant changes you mentioned, but I figured I'd call them out anyways.

The new boolean switches look kind of funny, color wise. Specifically the blue-on-red. I'd go with a neutral color for the text here:

![screenshot-2017-11-27 shield control panel](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/305049/33295057-4e3b5a72-d388-11e7-9896-76c098481000.png)

There are some odd focus issues in the history sidebar. You can see these either by tabbing to them, or just by clicking them:

![screenshot from 2017-11-27 15-34-22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/305049/33295109-928811ca-d388-11e7-9742-37e42a21d39c.png)

I think the rest of the site looks pretty good. Nice work!
